+model Teacher {
+  id        String   @id @default(uuid())

+
 model Class {
   id         String    @id @default(uuid())
   name       String
   teacherId  String
+  teacher    Teacher   @relation(fields: [teacherId], references: [id])
   students   Student[]
   records    AttendanceRecord[]
   createdAt  DateTime  @default(now())
 }
+
+model Student {
+  id        String   @id @default(uuid())
+  name      String
+  classId   String

+  entries   AttendanceEntry[]

+}
+
+model AttendanceRecord {
+  id        String   @id @default(uuid())
+  classId   String
+  class     Class    @relation(fields: [classId], references: [id])
+  date      DateTime
+  entries   AttendanceEntry[]
+  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
+
+  @@unique([classId, date]) // prevent duplicate record same day
+}
+
+model AttendanceEntry {
+  id          String   @id @default(uuid())
+  recordId    String

+

+  student     Student          @relation(fields: [studentId], references: [id])
+

+}

+

+}
+

+  status      String
+  synced      Boolean  @default(false)
+  updatedAt   DateTime @updatedAt
+
+  record      AttendanceRecord @relation(fields: [recordId], references: [id])

+

+}

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
model Teacher {
  id        String   @id @default(uuid())
  name      String
  email     String   @unique
  classes   Class[]
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
}

model Class {
  id         String    @id @default(uuid())
  name       String
  teacherId  String
  teacher    Teacher   @relation(fields: [teacherId], references: [id])
  students   Student[]
  records    AttendanceRecord[]
  createdAt  DateTime  @default(now())
}

model Student {
  id        String   @id @default(uuid())
  name      String
  classId   String
  class     Class    @relation(fields: [classId], references: [id])
  entries   AttendanceEntry[]
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
}

model AttendanceRecord {
  id        String   @id @default(uuid())
  classId   String
  class     Class    @relation(fields: [classId], references: [id])
  date      DateTime
  entries   AttendanceEntry[]
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())

  @@unique([classId, date]) // prevent duplicate record same day
}

model AttendanceEntry {
  id          String   @id @default(uuid())
  recordId    String
  studentId   String
  status      String   // PRESENT / ABSENT
  synced      Boolean  @default(false)
  updatedAt   DateTime @updatedAt

  record      AttendanceRecord @relation(fields: [recordId], references: [id])
  student     Student          @relation(fields: [studentId], references: [id])

  @@unique([recordId, studentId]) // avoid duplicate per student
}
